scripts.build: npm run copy-icons && npm run process-versions && npm run generate-translations && eleventy
scripts.start: npm run copy-icons && npm run process-versions && npm run generate-translations && eleventy --serve
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run copy-icons && npm run process-versions && npm run generate-translations && eleventy --serve --watch
scripts.ci-prepare: npm run process-versions && npm run check-status
